channel.title: RsBrother - Unique Adventure To Be Yourself *
channel.description:
[s][/s][CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/zOZv6q3.png?1[/img] [FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4][I]Players[/I][/SIZE][/FONT] come across new servers everyday and wonder what makes your server worth joining? To make a server worth joining, it needs something unique. Something that shows them you will do anything and everything to gain your time and respect. Hopefully this advertisement will show you what we have to offer as a community and what our development team has come together to produce for your needs. We, as a development team work for the people to produce updates that will make playing our server worth while. What's a server without the players? So we are working hard everyday to keep you, the players, to keep coming back to see what more we have to offer our community. To see more about what i'm talking about, why not come take a look at what we're offering.
- [SIZE=4]The RsBrother Team[/SIZE]
[B][U][FONT=Georgia][SIZE=6]WHAT DO WE HAVE TO OFFER?[/SIZE][/FONT][/U][/B]
[B][U][FONT=Arial Narrow][SIZE=3]Welcoming YOU to OUR Server[/SIZE][/FONT][/U][/B]
[B][U][SIZE=4]Need help settling in? Talk to The RsBrother Guide for information on the server! [/SIZE][/U][/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/thI19xf.png?1[/img]
[B][U][SIZE=4]When logging in, you will be put into the "help" CC to welcome you to our server with lots of CC features! [/SIZE][/U][/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/hFkgjfH.png?1[/img]
[B][U][FONT=Arial Narrow][SIZE=3]Minigames[/SIZE][/FONT][/U][/B]
[B][U][SIZE=4]100% Working Barbarian Assault with full shop[/SIZE][/U][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gFYn5C2.png?1[/img]
[B][U][SIZE=4]100% Working Castle wars with everything working! [/SIZE][/U][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/l1Jic1e.png?1[/img]
[B][U][SIZE=4]100% Working Duel Arena with no dupes! [/SIZE][/U][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/fNUu46F.png?1[/img]
[B][U][SIZE=4]100% Working Fishing Trawler Minigame! [/SIZE][/U][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5B1bXwV.png?1[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/W4cD8Ae.png?1[/img]
[B][U][SIZE=4]100% Working Pest Control with working void! [/SIZE][/U][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/JurklhU.png?1[/img]
[B][U][SIZE=4]100% Working Clue Scrolls [/SIZE][/U][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/twpMHlZ.png?1[/img]
[B][U][SIZE=4]Coming soon in the next couple updates... SOUL WARS [/SIZE][/U][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/CwnTCL4.png?1[/img]
[B][I][U][FONT=Georgia][SIZE=5]More Minigames coming soon! Don't miss out on the fun![/SIZE][/FONT][/U][/I][/B]
[B][U][FONT=Arial Narrow][SIZE=3]Skills, Training, Bosses[/SIZE][/FONT][/U][/B]
[B][U][SIZE=4]100% Skilling with different features! Bored of the same old places to train? Talk to the NPC by the training area to train in a different location for different levels! [/SIZE][/U][/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Md5zkpO.png?1[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/GVc6K08.png?1[/img]
[B][U][SIZE=4]Custom Bossing & Training areas with tons of valuable drops! Like slayer! [/SIZE][/U][/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0KolE1r.png?1[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/q5Qrqb0.png?1[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Md5zkpO.png?1[/img]
So what are [FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]YOU[/SIZE][/FONT] waiting for? Come see what we have to offer at [SIZE=4][FONT=Arial Black]RsBrother[/FONT][/SIZE], A [FONT=Book Antiqua][SIZE=4]Unique[/SIZE][/FONT] Adventure To Be [FONT=Georgia][SIZE=4]Yourself[/SIZE][/FONT].
[B][U][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=5][URL=http://"http://rsbrother.net/RsBrother317.jar"]PLAY | [/URL] [URL=http://"http://rsbrother.net/forums"] FORUMS |[/URL] [URL=http://"http://rsbrother.net/donate"] DONATE[/URL][/SIZE][/FONT][/U][/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/NHzWq51.png?1[/img] [/CENTER]
